summary: Add's Craftable arrows, and lockpicks at the Blacksmith's forge.
descriptionHtml:
Add\'s ability to craft Arrows, lockpicks at the Black smith\'s forge requires perks similar to armors/weapons.
Currently Arrows added are:Iron, Steel, Ancient (Nord), Elven, Dwarven, Glass, Ebony, Daedric
author: RainbowMaun
